# default

**Type Property**

The shared file manager object for the process.

## Declaration

```swift
class var `default`: FileManager { get }
```

## Discussion

This method always represents the same file manager object. If you plan to use a delegate with the file manager to receive notifications about the completion of file-based operations, you should create a new instance of [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/FileManager] rather than using the shared object.

## Creating a file manager

- **init(authorization:)**: Initializes a file manager object that is authorized to perform privileged file system operations.
